arts.ttl: Sheffield United 1-0: Fortuitous Blades climbs to third
arts.sum: Sheffield United made it a fifth clean sheet in a row on Wednesday evening against Swansea City, and in doing so they claimed all three points for the third time at Bramall Lane this season.
